import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { FormControl, Validators } from '@angular/forms'; import { CommonService } from 'src/app/services/common.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-welcome', templateUrl: './welcome.component.html', styleUrls: ['./welcome.component.scss'], }) export class WelcomeComponent { constructor(private cs: CommonService) {} currentStep = 3; jump = 1; avatars = [0, 1, 2, 3, 4]; selectedAvatar!: String; name = ''; namePattern = '^[a-zA-Z ]*$'; roomName = new FormControl('', Validators.minLength(3)); players = new FormControl('', Validators.required); previousStep() { if (this.currentStep > 1) { this.currentStep - this.jump; } } nextStep(steps = 1) { if (this.currentStep < 5) { this.currentStep += steps; } } }
